SummaryEnglish: The journey to the West was a conspiracy of heaven! After Sutra went missing for more than a decade, Heaven sent its army to search, in order not to let the Sutra once again fall into the hands of heaven, the journey to West begin again.

0.TitleEnglish: Xi Xing Ji Movie Goodbye Wukong 2020
0.SummaryEnglish:
Adapted to the story of “Journey to the West”, Princess Tianyi met Sun Wukong in the world, and they fell in love with each other. However, Goku Sun Wukong was cruelly treated by other gods as a Mortal Monster and suppressed under Mount Wuzhi.
For three hundred years, if the Great Gods did that to change Wukong, how to teach Wukong to uphold justice in his heart. Sun Wukong protected Tang Sanzang and went to the other side of the world to take the “Sutra” in the west to benefit the world. After wandering, he finally returned, but he found a great conspiracy to emerge

1.SummaryEnglish: Film is set before the events of Westward season one. For some reason, the Sutra is referred to as “Fire of Creation” in this film. Also, Nirvana is basically the same as the Western Paradise in the animation series.

2.SummaryEnglish: Taking the story of Tang Sanzang and others' journey before obtaining the Eternal Flame (Before Season 1) - Tang Sanzang and others went to the other side of the world to obtain the Eternal Flame, and traveled through the cities of the world. They were attracted by the fantastic and beautiful view of Qiongqi Cave, but instead got lost in the cave. Therefore, they accidentally found out about the conspiracy of Demon King Bai Yandi of Qiong Qi Cave. In order to prevent the shocking catastrophe that would strike the entire Demon Path, Master and Disciple fought together. But, Sun Wukong was controlled by his mind and turned into a giant ape. In the face of an unprecedented desperate situation and crisis, how will Tang Sanzang and the others fight back?

3.TitleEnglish: The Westward: The City of Shadows
3.SummaryEnglish: Standalone film set before the events of the first season.
